response.overview: On a remote Irish farm, Mark burns the remnants of the group’s past in preparation for “the jump”—a ritual vaguely marketed as spiritual transcendence, but looking more and more like a well-dressed mass suicide.
response.tagline: Mark is left behind with Ren in preparation for “the jump”- a ritual vaguely marketed as spiritual transcendence. When an escaped member of the cult unexpectedly appears, Mark begins to question their adopted dogma.
response.title: I Woke Up Like This
